name: Erie v. R. D. McAllister & Son, Appellants
name_abbreviation: Erie v. R. D. McAllister & Son

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
parties: Erie v. R. D. McAllister & Son, Appellants.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment affirmed on the able opinion of Judge Laub, 35 Pa. D. & C. 2d 591.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: John M. Wolford, with him Edward H. Carney, and Dunn & Wolford, for appellants.
Gerald J. Weber, with him Knox, Weber, Pearson & McLaughlin, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Erie v. R. D. McAllister & Son, Appellants.
Argued March 19, 1964.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
reargument refused July 17, 1964.
July 1, 1964:
John M. Wolford, with him Edward H. Carney, and Dunn & Wolford, for appellants.
Gerald J. Weber, with him Knox, Weber, Pearson & McLaughlin, for appellee.
